title: Simple Leaky Exploration Notebook - Quora
description: In this simple exploration notebook, let us try and explore the dataset given for this competition. Update on 25 May 2017: Since there are a couple of leaky features now, let us explore the same as well in the notebook Objective: To classify whether question pairs are duplicate or not. Let us start with importing the necessary modules for exploring the data.
